name: Ultimate Mafia - Real World Land Wars
name_original: Ultimate Mafia - Real World Land Wars
description:
Get ready to play the beloved Mafia game on a whole another level.

Don't you wish you could earn Reward Points by PLAYING fun games instead of paying for them every time? Now you can with Ultimate Mafia through Reward Games.

Featuring more missions, more items, plus soon to be added all new Real World Land Wars that lets you play with the real world near you like never before.

************************************

Ultimate Mafia - Real World Land Wars is the next generation FREE online massively multi player mafia game that puts the control back in the player's hands.

Great for fans of Mafia Wars, iMob Online, Mafia Live, or iMobsters.
